snippet: With the involvement of other theaters in the West Village, Rattlestick Playwrights Theater is setting the stage for the simultaneous production of a five-play cycle by Lucy Thurber.
abstract: Rattlestick Playwrights Theater, with involvement of other theaters in New York City's  West Village, is setting stage for the simultaneous production of five-play cycle by Lucy Thurber.
lead_paragraph: With the involvement of other theaters in the West Village, Rattlestick Playwrights Theater is setting the stage for the simultaneous production of a five-play cycle by Lucy Thurber.

headline.seo: Rattlestick Oversees Lucy Thurber’s Five-Play Cycle
headline.main: Village Rallies Round a Playwright’s Tale
headline.print_headline: Village Rallies Round a Playwright’s Tale
